channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Emptoris Contract Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Emptoris Contract Management

item.title: CVE-2020-4897|2024-09-17T03:14:32.561Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20contract%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Contract Management and IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis 10.1.0, 10.1.1, and 10.1.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 190988.
